header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 2, page 2, line 36, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) contribute towards preventing adults in its area experiencing, or being put at risk of, abuse or neglect;”

text.quote: 000: Clause 2, page 3, line 1, leave out paragraph (c) and insert—
text.IndentOne: “(c) working with each NHS body in the authority’s area to identify carers with needs for support which are not being met (by the authority or otherwise)”

text.quote: 000: After Clause 46, insert the following new Clause—
“Human Rights Act 1998: provision of “care and support services” to be public function

(1) A person (“P”) who provides regulated “social care” is to be taken for the purposes of subsection (3)(b) of section 6 of the Human Rights Act 1998 (acts of public authorities) to be exercising a function of a public nature in doing so.
(2) This section applies to persons providing services regulated by the Care Quality Commission.
(3) In this section “social care” has the same meaning as in the Health and Social Care Act 2008.”
